name: Novanta Inc.
description: Novanta Inc. is a global provider of precision photonics, motion, and imaging solutions that enable advanced technology in various applications. Founded in 1978 and headquartered in Bedford, Massachusetts, Novanta operates through several business segments, including Photonics, Vision, and Motion. The company serves a diverse range of markets, such as medical technology, industrial automation, and scientific research. Novanta's innovative products include laser systems, optical components, motion control systems, and advanced imaging solutions, all designed to enhance performance, reliability, and precision in their respective fields. With a strong focus on engineering excellence and customer collaboration, Novanta aims to deliver high-quality solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients. The company's commitment to sustainability and corporate responsibility is reflected in its operations and product development, ensuring that it contributes positively to both the industry and the environment. Novanta continues to invest in research and development to push the boundaries of technology and maintain its competitive edge in the market.
